title: Akali needs to be nerfed into unviable tier until she gets another rework
body:
Shes quite easily the most toxic champion released in the last 1~2 years (the only one coming even close is pyke, and even then hes not as bad as her).

Too much damage, too much mobility, too many uncounterable and unfun mechanics (true stealth has to be one of the dumbest things ive ever seen in a multiplayer video game, STEALTH HAS SPECIFIC COUNTERS FOR A REASON FFS) into her kit.

Like wow, this champion bends the whole game just for the satisfaction of the akali player, completely disregarding the fact theres also other 9 players in that same game. CertaintlyT needs to stop making new champs (or reworking them) into those abminations, its kind of ridiculous when i have to say that the old, full point and click akali was more fun to play against and had more counterplay, but sadly its the truth.

Do not revert her W so anyone with 75 gold can counter her entire kit.

Original akali was not countered with pink wards she was punished by them when she tried to over abuse shroud. 

Also in high elo she was almost always built as a moderate bruiser because otherwise she would just get one shot with no escape (shroud countered by a pink ward ) 

The issue is that if shroud is too reliable than the rest of her kit will be gutted. 

The same thing happened to rogues in wow when they "fixed" vanish. 

Shroud should be an ability to use wisely. Not 5 seconds of turret immunity every 20.
I wouldn't say they are getting worse, I think riot is just inconsistent on their output.  The good ones are fine, the bad ones leave a terrible stink.
I'd be okay with them reverting her W if it meant I was allowed to buffer jump again

Even better than this would be a Revert to her original form where pink wards worked on her shroud and she had her spell vamp and %magic damage passive instead of this NUCLEAR 1 SHOT SECOND AUTO ATTACK KABOOM ZOMG!!!

Original Akali was very very fun. They should have just put a longer cooldown on her ult and called it a day. She never needed her rework originally. They could have easily tuned her kit.

Then take this new champ and make it into a new champ like it deserves to be.
